Key Match Events: Argentina dominated the ball in the opening 45 minutes
Alexis Mac Allister popped up from midfield to fire Argentina into a deserved lead
Julián Alvarez got his name on the scoresheet with a screamer from the edge of the box just shortly before Paulo Dybala added a third
Pre-Game Insights: The two sides had experienced opposite fortunes in the opening seven games of the qualifying schedule
Argentina came into the night having won five of their opening matches, while Chile have been in a rut with just one win
Post-Match Reflections: Next up for the reigning champions is a qualifying showdown with Colombia, while Chile will take on Bolivia
Miscellaneous Highlights: The dam finally broke soon after the restart
Argentina extended their lead at the top of the table
